prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a small mysterious martial artist, extremely pale porcelain skin with red circular ceremonial makeup on cheeks, wearing a traditional black satin hat with a red button, green imperial outfit
feature_prompt: thick white theatrical makeup texture on skin, realistic rosy paint on cheeks, detailed silk embroidery on outfit, single hair strand, expressive eyes
